stepTitle: The Moon’s craters are remnants of meteorite collisions. Suppose a fairly large asteroid that has a mass of $$5.00×1012$$ kg (about a kilometer across) strikes the Moon at a speed of $$15.0$$ $$\frac{km}{s}$$. At what speed does the Moon recoil after the perfectly inelastic collision (the mass of the Moon is $$7.361022$$ kg)?
